code: import{getDiffDates}from"../Components/UserData/helpers/getDiffDates";export var getLeftMonth=function getLeftMonth(_ref){var start=_ref.start,end=_ref.end;if(!start||!end){return{months:0,leftDays:0};}var diff=getDiffDates({start:start,end:end});var days=diff/86400000;var months=Math.floor(days/30);var leftDays=Math.floor(days/30-months);if(leftDays[-1]===1){leftDays+=" День";}else if(2<=leftDays[-1]<=4){leftDays+=" Дня";}else{leftDays+=" Дней";}if(months===0){months="Пакет не активен";}else if(months===1){months+=" Месяц";}else if(2<=months&&months<=4){months+=" Месяца";}else{months+=" Месяцев";}return{months:months,leftDays:leftDays};};
